allow: Bash(ssh root@148.230.71.240 "cd /root/esports-tracker && cp deploy/generated/.env .env && echo ''.env copie avec succes''")
Bash(ssh root@148.230.71.240 "cd /root/esports-tracker && chmod +x install.sh && echo ''install.sh est maintenant executable''")
Bash(ssh root@148.230.71.240 "cd /root/esports-tracker && source .env && echo ''DOMAIN=$DOMAIN'' && echo ''DB_USER=$DB_USER'' && echo ''DB_DATABASE=$DB_DATABASE''")
Bash(ssh root@148.230.71.240 "cd /root/esports-tracker && docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml up -d")
Bash(ssh root@148.230.71.240 "docker exec -i esports-postgres psql -U monsieuryordle -d esports < /root/esports-tracker/scripts/schema.sql 2>&1 | tail -20")
